pageContext.claim: ““Michael Cohen asks judge for no Prison Time.” You mean he can do all of the TERRIBLE, unrelated to Trump, things having to do with fraud, big loans, Taxis, etc., and not serve a long prison term? He makes up stories to get a GREAT & ALREADY reduced deal for himself.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump Attorney Michael Cohen pleaded guilty to a variety of charges including lying to Congress about a Trump Organization effort to develop a tower in Moscow and payments to women covering up Trump's alleged affairs. Cohen asked for a reduced sentence based on his cooperation with both the Southern District of New York's investigation and Mueller's.
